import "./framework.css"; import "./master.css"; import "./style1.css"; import "./dashbord.css"; import { db } from "../fireba/firebase"; import { useState } from "react"; import { useAuth } from "../context/AuthContext"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import profile from "./avatar.png" import welcome from "./welcome.png" import photo from "./profile-user.png" import change from "./cigarette.png" import setting from "./settings.png" import friend from "./friends.png" import multipe from "./multiple-users-silhouette.png" import React from 'react' import { Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import { doc, getDoc } from "firebase/firestore"; export default function Dashboard() { async function getUserById(userId) { try { const userDocRef = doc(db, "users", userId); const { name,age,country } = userData; const userDoc = await getDoc(userDocRef); if (userDoc.exists()) { console.log(userDoc.data()); // Afficher les donn√©es du document } else { console.log("Aucun utilisateur trouv√©"); } } catch (error) { console.error("Erreur lors de la r√©cup√©ration de l'utilisateur: ", error); }} async function handleLogout() { setError(""); try { await logout(); navigate("/login"); } catch { setError("Failed to log out"); } } return (
